item.title: Where did the Staubach-Pearson 'Hail Mary' football end up after 50 years?
item.description: After reeling in the historic pass, Drew Pearson chucked the ball out of the stadium in celebration.

item.description: As the coaching carousel continues to spin, we grade every major hire.

item.title: Bears clinch North title with GB loss; 1st since '18
item.description: The Chicago Bears locked up the NFC North on Saturday night at the conclusion of Green Bay's 41-24 loss to Baltimore.
